theLegendOfFinn.model.gameData

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • theLegendOfFinn.model.gameData.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Provides a matrix of Entities to take record of the position that every one of them occupies in the map.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
